article_title: Real Entitlement Reform With The Doc Fix Repeal

article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.description: It is long past the time for Congress to recognize and rectify a failed policy. An earlier Congress, led by former speaker Newt Gingrich, decided to cut payments to physicians in Medicare to help balance the federal budget. That was in 1997, but even that Congress postponed the cuts until a future [...]
